About Me
Colton Morrill

Background

Experienced and proven Front End Developer and Graphic Designer. I studied at BYU-I and got my degree in Web Design.

Before this I was involved in Web Design through extra curriculars in my highschool. While in college I freelanced for different business such as ChickFila and N2 by DaVill.

After graduating I worked for an SEO company that specialized in websites for real estate investors. SEO for REI decided to open an internal dev team and I joined that team as the Director of Web Design. After getting married and moving to Utah I joined Tack Systems LLC as their sole Web Designer.

Web Designer
Tack Systems LLC | April 2021 - Present
